price: ߊߟߎ ߟߋ߫ ߞߵߏ߬ ߦߙߌ ߘߊ߲߫ ߓߊ߬ ߸ ߥߟߊ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߊ߲ߠߌ߲ߠߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫؟
arabic: ءَأَنتُمۡ أَنشَأۡتُمۡ شَجَرَتَهَآ أَمۡ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُنشِـُٔونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: a-antum anshatum shajaratahā am naḥnu al-munshiūna
